name: Martini (classic)
ingredients: Garnish: lemon twist or 1 or 3 olives
Optional: 1 dash orange or aromatic bitters
recipe: In a mixing glass full of ice cubes, combine gin and vermouth. Put more or less vermouth according to taste
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass
Add a dash of bitters, if desired
Garnish with olives or a lemon twist
